name: Aurora Sounds
description:
Begin in a dark world with the beautiful and colourful Aurora overhead. Explore the uses of the strange and alluring spheres that float gently down from the Aurora. Learn how to turn the dark world around you into a vibrant and dynamic visual wonder, moving and pulsing to the beat of your personal music library.

Aurora Sounds is a short, interactive music visualizer that you can enjoy with your local mp3 library. A default track is included thanks to bensound.com.

Requires an Oculus Rift.

Supported by ACT Government and Screen Canberra.
